com.stormpath.shiro.realm

Interface AccountRoleResolver


  • public interface AccountRoleResolver
    An AccountRoleResolver inspects a Stormpath Account and translates it to one or more Role names that Shiro can use for role-based access control checks.

    Note: This component is only necessary if you are not using Stormpath Groups as Shiro Roles.
    Stormpath Account resources are usually associated with one or more Stormpath Groups and those Groups can be represented as Shiro roles by using the GroupRoleResolver. You only need this component to represent Account roles that are not already represented as Stormpath Groups via the GroupRoleResolver.

    Shiro uses the resulting role names (in addition to any resolved Group role names) to support role-based access control via a subject's hasRole(String roleName) checks.

    Since:
    0.3
    See Also:
    GroupRoleResolver, DefaultGroupRoleResolver

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<String> resolveRoles(com.stormpath.sdk.account.Account account)
      Inspects a Stormpath Account and resolves it to one or more role names that Shiro can use for role-based access control checks.

    • Method Detail

      • resolveRoles

        Set<String> resolveRoles(com.stormpath.sdk.account.Account account)
        Inspects a Stormpath Account and resolves it to one or more role names that Shiro can use for role-based access control checks.

        This is only necessary if you are not using Stormpath Groups as Shiro Roles.
        Stormpath Account resources are usually associated with one or more Stormpath Groups and those Groups can be represented as Shiro roles by using the GroupRoleResolver. You only need this component to represent Account roles that are not already represented as Stormpath Groups via the GroupRoleResolver.

        Shiro uses the resulting role names (in addition to any resolved Group role names) to support role-based access control via a subject's hasRole(String roleName) checks.

        Parameters:
        account - the Stormpath account to resolve to Shiro role names.
        Returns:
        a set role names attributed to the account, to be used by Shiro for runtime role checks.
        See Also:
        GroupRoleResolver, DefaultGroupRoleResolver
